content: **drops christmas crochet drops rug with stripes and zig-zag pattern in eskimo ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** approx 95 cm / 37½ in diameter **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 400 g color no 56 christmas red 150 g color no 01 off white drops crochet hook size 7 mm/us k or l or size needed to get 10 double_crochet x 6 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=6807&cid=19
